briefTitle: Long-Term Safety and Tolerability of Canakinumab Prefilled Syringes in Frequently Flaring Acute Gouty Arthritis Patients
officialTitle: A 36-week Open-label Extension Study of CACZ885H2361 on the Safety and Tolerability of Canakinumab 150 mg s.c. Pre-filled Syringe (PFS) in Treating Acute Gouty Arthritis Flares in Frequently Flaring Patients
summary: This is a 36 week open-label extension of the canakinumab pre-filled syringe study for safety and tolerability in patients who have frequent flares of acute gouty arthritis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Reported Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From start of the core study (CACZ885H2361 [NCT01356602]) upto end of the current study (48 weeks)
